Name: Opulent Ornaments
About: These are a four generation project:  My great-grammy taught my mama, who taught me, and me and my mama taught my grammy.  All of these beads are glass.

Name: Origami Ornaments
About: These ornaments were given to us by a friend, and me and my mama taught ourselves together.

Name: Quilled Snowflake Ornaments
About: These snowflakes are a self-taught project, a project that I have taught my mama.

Name: Beaded Snowflakes
About: These sparkling ornaments are made out of glass beads, and are a project me and my mama learned together.

Name: Beaded Earrings
About: These earrings are made out of glass beads, and are a project my mama taught me.

Name: Beaded Hairclips
About: These hairclips are made out of glass beads, and are a project me and my mama learned together.  They do not tangle in hair.

Name: Crochet Scarves
About: This is a project my mama taught me how to do, and while on vacation, in our spare time, we would crochet together.  These scarves are soft and durable, each with a different purpose.

Name: Renewable Reusable Bags
About: These reusable bags are 100% cotton.  They can be washed and tumble dried on medium.  The large bags are sturdy and can be used for packaged foods, while the small bags are food safe and unbleached for produce.

Name: Felt Food
About: These fun recipes are made of felt, and the recipes can also be made in real life.  The recipes are taco, pizza, and sushi.
